forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 55. Southwest wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, a serenity settles in with mostly clear skies enveloping the city. The air, still cool from the night, holds the gentle touch of a mild breeze, whispering reminders of the day ahead. As the sun begins its ascent, it promises warmth—though the low clouds may linger along the coast, a soft marine layer hinting at the intricate dance of fog that often graces this iconic landscape.

By mid-morning, the city will bask in sunlight, with temperatures climbing to comfortable heights. A subtle chill may still embrace those venturing out early, suggesting light layers would be wise—a sweater or a light jacket to ward off the morning's coolness while leaving room to transition into the sun’s revelry. The wind, modest yet persistent, will rustle through the streets, inviting locals to step outside, perhaps to indulge in a leisurely stroll along the waterfront or to explore the vibrant blocks lined with cafes and boutiques. There’s an allure in the gentle bustle of the day, a reminder of life thriving in harmony with the elements. As the city shakes off the remnants of night, it beckons you to partake in its everyday enchantments, perhaps with a warm cup of coffee in hand, watching the world awaken around you.
